DataElement.preferredName: Abdominal Cavity Pelvis Computed Tomography Diagnostic Imaging Performed Date
DataElement.preferredDefinition: the date related to abdominal pelvis CT or MRI scan performed.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Abdominal Cavity Pelvis Computed Tomography Diagnostic Imaging Performed
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information relating to abdominal pelvis CT or MRI scan performed.

ObjectClass.preferredName: Abdominal Cavity Pelvis Computed Tomography Diagnostic Imaging
ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: (AB-do-men) The area of the body that contains the pancreas, stomach, intestine, liver, gallbladder, and other organs.:The structure of the vertebrate skeleton supporting the lower limbs in humans and the hind limbs or corresponding parts in other vertebrates.:Tomography using x-ray transmission and a computer algorithm to reconstruct the image.:Any method that uses a visual display of structural or functional patterns of organs or tissues for diagnostic evaluation..

Concepts.definition: The cavity located between the lungs and pelvis. It contains the lower esophagus, stomach, pancreas, intestines, liver, gallbladder and spleen.
The bony, basin-shaped structure formed by the hipbones and the base of the backbone supporting the lower limbs in humans.
A method of examining structures within the body by scanning them with X rays and using a computer to construct a series of cross-sectional scans along a single axis.
Any method that uses a visual display of structural or functional patterns of organs or tissues for diagnostic evaluation.
Executed and carried through to completion.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

DataElementConcept.origin: RTOG CRF:Radiation Therapy Oncology Group Case Report Form

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The date on which an observation was made or an event occurred.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: a particular day specified as the time something has, or will, happen.

Concepts.definition: The particular day, month and year an event has happened or will happen.
